subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|立|青|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=to stand; to establish}}.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Same word as {{och-l|靜|to keep quiet}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). See there for more.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} [[stable]]; [[peaceful]]; [[tranquil]]
# {{†}} to [[pacify]]; to [[stabilize]]
# {{†}} to [[govern]]; to [[administer]]
# {{†}} to [[plan]]
# {{†}} to [[think]] of
# {{†}} [[respectful]]; [[prudent]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
